title: Pizzeria Jolly
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Delivery, Take-out, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a dedicated vegan section on the menu, containing seven pizzas. Meals which are not listed specifically as vegan can be veganized. Owner is well informed about veganism. Delivery to Schönau am Königssee, Berchtesgaden, Bischofswiesen and Ramsau. Has a few parking spots in front of the restaurant.
